ValidationRule.description: MMS SDRs should only edit MMS Opps under certain conditions
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name = 'MMS SDR', $RecordType.Name = 'MMS Opportunity Record Type', NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED(Probability), OR(PRIORVALUE(Probability)< 0.20,Probability >= 0.80))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The status update of Create Qualified, Sold or greater must be updated by the selling rep. Please work with the opportunity owner to make this update.
